events.message: I have just reported my car accident that occurred yesterday when another vehicle collided with mine at an intersection.
The claim has been categorized under auto accident following review of the initial report and accident details provided.
An agent specializing in vehicle collision claims has been assigned to your case to guide you through the process.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim regarding the auto accident and assure you of our full support in the investigation and settlement.
Please provide a copy of the police report, your driverâ€™s license, and photos of the vehicle damage to proceed with the claim.
All requested documents including police report and photos have been uploaded through the customer portal for your claim.
Our investigation team has begun assessing the collision circumstances and verifying the details in the submitted documents.
The investigation was completed successfully confirming fault assessment and damage extent for the auto accident claim.
We have proposed a settlement amount that covers the repair costs of your vehicle as evaluated by the investigator.
Thank you for your prompt feedback expressing satisfaction with the proposed auto accident settlement offer.
Your claim has been officially approved based on the investigation and submitted documentation for the vehicle collision.
The settlement payment has been processed and issued to your bank account for the repairs to your vehicle.
The auto accident claim has been closed following successful settlement and payment disbursement with no further issues.
